noun.description: (in folklore or fantasy literature) a member of a mythical race of short, stocky humanlike creatures who are generally skilled in mining and metalworking.
A star of relatively small size and low luminosity, including the majority of main sequence stars.

verb.description: Cause to seem small or insignificant in comparison.
examples: the buildings surround and dwarf All Saints church

origin: Old English dweorg, dweorh, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch dwerg and German Zwerg.
